name: createMssqlUnmount
description: Create an async request to delete a Live Mount of a SQL Server database. Poll the task status by using /mssql/request/{id}.

id.description: ID of the Live Mount to delete.

force.description: Remove all data within the Rubrik cluster related to the Live Mount, even if the SQL Server database cannot be contacted. Default value is false.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
